segments.text: I see this cozy kitchen with sunlight streaming in from the window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a woman standing by the sink, carefully drying a plate with a towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so focused on that dish, not paying attention to anything else.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Oh no, the sink is overflowing right behind her!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is pouring out over the edge, making a big puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is already in the water, but she doesn't seem to notice at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how long this has been going on.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To her left, there's a boy climbing on a little stool to reach the cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got his hand in the cookie jar, grabbing some treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks wobbly, like it might tip over any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And there's a girl standing nearby, reaching up with her hand out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She must be waiting for a cookie from her brother.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's kind of cute how they're sneaking snacks.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But this whole scene is a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR
